Text: Edgecombe Cc a draft blackline and clean copy of the Edgecombe PPA We did not address the issue of security in this draft but still regard it as an open item subject to further discussion We look forward to receiving the information on the fuel arrangements equipment specifications and construction cost estimates so we can better evaluate the proposal you presented last Thursday See attached file VP August blackline PPADOCSee attached file VP August clean PPADOC VP August blackline PPADOC VP August clean PPADOC
